pathAssistantSteps.info: Mark why opportunity was lost. This is important in analysing and planning perspective

• Contract is sent to customer for signing
  • Follow up the customer contract review in order to ensure smooth sale

Prepare for order within 3 days from signature

  • Validate measurement & other data is correct before sending order to ERP
  • Make sure all information is in place
  • Confirm installation date
  • Finalize order details

Make sure you have confirmed installation time and customer contract is signed BEFORE closing opportunity

After you close Opportunity, Order is send to ERP and you CANNOT edit data. Make sure everything is right before closing.

Get commitment

  • Sign preliminary contract in case building permit is needed, 2nd measurement is needed, it is a special order or there is any other reason for preliminary contract
  • agree on next steps & follow up
  • Make sure reason for preliminary contract is resolved (building permit granted, special order case closed, 2nd measurement meeting held or other reason resolved) before moving to next stage

Prepare for the customer meeting

  • Identify the products & services required, gather samples, Make sure resources and assistance is available (if needed)
  • Determine your sales approach
  • Validate building, installation address & structural information BEFORE creating plan

Guide towards the deal in the customer visit

  • Present look & feel of the solution, Communicate the value of your solution
  • Get measurement (possibly with assistance)
  • Validate building, installation address & structural information BEFORE creating plan
  • Check Installation duration, (estimated) delivery date and installation address BEFORE scheduling preliminary installation time
  • Confirm customer Payment plan, Invoice type, Billing address, Delivery location, Delivery date, schedule preliminary installation time BEFORE creating quote PDF
